item.title: AI Dial-Up Era: The Last Window to Truly Understand AI
item.description:
AI Dial-Up Era: The Last Window to Truly Understand AI

Inspired by Alex Prompter. The “ease of use” in AI tools is quietly closing the window to truly understand the technology.

The Expensive Excuse

“I will learn AI when it matures.”

This sounds reasonable. This is also the most expensive sentence you can say in 2026.

What the Internet Taught Us

In 1993, getting online meant configuring dial-up modems, navigating BBS boards, and understanding HTTP/DNS/FTP. Those people became the founders and CTOs of Yahoo, Amazon, and Google.
